about.introduction: Hi, my name is Hajar Rashidi, and I have been working as a Software Engineer for about 7 years. Currently, I work as a consultant at Sogeti, where I primarily focus on web development.
about.interests: Some of my interests include programming, health, and finance. I am passionate about learning new things and constantly evolving. I would describe myself as a helpful and creative person.
about.cvInfo: This CV was developed by me using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind.

workExperience.title: Fullstack Software Engineer at Sogeti
workExperience.description: Hajar has worked on several web development projects at Sogeti. He has been responsible for SSAB WearIQ's website, written in React, and their mobile cross-platform app developed in Flutter. He has further developed Oskarshamn Nuclear Power Plant's web app and mobile app in Flutter, integrated a self-developed open-source library for BankID as a login system for Mid Sweden University, further developed Studentbostader.se in React & PHP, and is now assisting the Swedish Civil Aviation Administration in migrating and refactoring code to .NET 8.

assignments.title: LFV
assignments.description: Develops and maintains LFV.se and migrates old code to .NET 8.

assignments.title: SSAB
assignments.description: Maintained SSAB WearIQ's mobile app (Flutter), website, and API (Node.js, Vue.js).

assignments.title: Oskarshamn Nuclear Power Plant
assignments.description: Maintained OKG's mobile app (Flutter) and web app (WordPress) with a focus on security and performance.

assignments.title: Mid Sweden University
assignments.description: Led the integration of BankID into the existing system and developed an open-source library for BankID version 6.

assignments.title: Stångåstaden AB
assignments.description: Maintained and further developed Studentbostader's WordPress website with a focus on user experience and performance.

workExperience.title: Fullstack Software Engineer at Prek
workExperience.description: Worked as a fullstack developer in a team on the real estate system Fasad. Responsible for both frontend and backend, from maintenance to new development.

workExperience.title: Fullstack Software Engineer at Intiro
workExperience.description: Developed a Xamarin mobile app for RTI Group that communicates via Bluetooth with calibration instruments for X-ray machines. Created user interfaces for data collection and visualization.

workExperience.title: Fullstack Developer at JobTip AB
workExperience.description: Developed matching algorithms for job candidates and advertisements via social media. Improved JobTip's internal publishing tool based on Laravel and Vue. Conducted functional tests and unit tests.

workExperience.title: Software Developer at Stratsys AB
workExperience.description: Developed and maintained APIs with .NET Core and C#. Designed database tables, implemented integrations with external services, and developed backend solutions for Vue.js applications. Used Jira and Scrum for project management. Hajar also completed LIA 1 and LIA 2 (Learning in Work) at Stratsys, each period comprising 3 months.

workExperience.title: Reseller at GameStop
workExperience.description: Worked as a reseller at GameStop Nordstan in Gothenburg. Assisted customers, managed the store, checked consoles, and sold and bought games and hardware.

education.description:
Over two years, Hajar studied two degrees simultaneously. The program consisted of 1.5 years of theoretical studies and projects, followed by 0.5 years of internship.

The curriculum included the following subjects:
Object-oriented programming (OOP) and Java (10+ weeks of EE), as well as SOLID principles, Spring Framework, design patterns, MySQL & PostgreSQL, JDBC and Hibernate, HTML, CSS, jQuery and AJAX, JAX-RS / Jersey, SCRUM.

This two-year higher education program focused on Node.js programming.

The program consisted of 1.5 years of theoretical studies and projects, followed by 0.5 years of internship.

The curriculum included the following subjects:
JavaScript (Node.js & NPM), MongoDB, React, Vue, HTML, CSS, jQuery and AJAX, Git, UX/UI, unit testing.

At Berzeliusskolan, Hajar studied the Technology Program. During his education, he took subjects such as Computer Technology, English, Physics, Interface Design, History, Physical Education, Chemistry, Mathematics, Programming, Religion, Social Studies, Swedish, Web Server Programming, and CAD.

Hajar studied web server programming in PHP and built a CMS. He also had programming courses in Java, which laid the foundation for his future career in software development.

certificates.name: Rotary's Anti-Bullying Project
certificates.description: Awarded Rotary's scholarship for participation in anti-bullying work at school
